title: Aggregate resource partial initialization failure cleans initialized prefix in reverse order

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
aggregate_requirements: field initialization follows declaration order for aggregate resources
on failure at field k, initialized fields [0..k-1] are cleaned exactly once in reverse declaration order
partial-init unwind uses the same LIFO scope-exit model as Part 8.1
runtime_assertions: function returns -1 if exactly-once counts are violated for any failure position

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
aggregate_requirements: optimization preserves reverse-order cleanup of initialized field prefixes on failure
optimization preserves exactly-once aggregate field cleanup counts
runtime_assertions: optimized lowering does not add duplicate cleanup callbacks for aggregate fields
